Sure! Here's a pitch that incorporates both the AI shopping assistant and blockchain supply chain:

---

Hello everyone,

Are you tired of sifting through endless product options when shopping online, only to end up with something that doesn't quite fit your needs? Our startup, [name], has the solution. We've created an AI shopping assistant that learns about your purchase behavior and suggests relevant products, so you can find exactly what you're looking for with ease.

But that's not all. Our shopping assistant is integrated with a private blockchain marketplace using Hyperledger, ensuring secure and transparent transactions. With our system, you can trust that your personal and financial data is safe and that your purchases are authentic.

But what about the products themselves? That's where our blockchain supply chain comes in. We've partnered with a network of trusted suppliers who use blockchain technology to track and verify the origin of their products, from raw materials to finished goods. With this information, we can ensure that our products are ethically sourced and meet the highest quality standards.

Our business model is simple. We plan to generate revenue through a combination of transaction fees on our blockchain marketplace, affiliate partnerships with retailers, and the sale of our AI bot technology to other businesses.

Now, you may be thinking, what about the competition? While there are other AI shopping assistants and blockchain supply chains on the market, our product offers a more personalized experience by learning about users' purchase behavior. Additionally, our integration of both technologies creates a comprehensive and secure shopping experience that sets us apart.

Our team includes experts in AI, blockchain, and e-commerce, so you can trust that we have the expertise to make this vision a reality.

In conclusion, [name] is poised to revolutionize the way people shop online by combining AI shopping assistance with blockchain supply chain technology. Join us on this exciting journey and experience personalized shopping with peace of mind. Thank you for your time.
